name: Countdown Media
tag_list: cover-music, music, studio, countdown-media, countdown, media
overview:
Countdown Media LP, with offices in Hamburg, Germany and Nashville, Tennessee, has been the world’s leading supplier of high quality cover music recordings for over 25 years. These recordings cover all genres from pop, rock, R&B, dance (including customized remixes), country, world, standards and oldies in vocal and instrumental formats to film and television theme songs, Broadway show tunes, backing tracks, classical and public domain recordings. Countdown Media’s tracks, utilized in everything from compact discs and cassettes to film and television commercials, are licensed to companies located throughout the world as compilations and standalone songs.

Countdown Media studios in Germany, the United Kingdom and the United States continuously record new covers of the latest international hits, adding to the more than 80,000 songs currently available for license through the company’s major catalog of master recordings. Cutting edge post-production studio equipment in Hamburg allows Countdown Media to create recordings of the highest quality. Growth has been fueled by Countdown’s strong Internet presence, built out with expanded search features and the latest digital technologies.
